title: ЛАПТОП DELL VOSTRO 3520 I3-1215U/8GB/512GB
description:
Лаптоп
Дисплеј:15.6" (39.6cm)
Резолуција: (1920 x 1080) FHD, 120Hz, 250nits, IPS
Процесор:12th  Generation Intel® Core™ i3-1215U (10 MB cache, 6 core, 8 threads, 1.20 GHz to 4.40 GHz, 15 W)
Графика: Intel® UHD Graphics
RAM меморија: 8GB DDR4 2666MHz
Диск (Storage): 512GB M.2 PCIe NVMe, SSD
Wi-Fi (Wi-Fi 802.11ac)+ Bluetooth
Камера: 720p at 30 fps HD camera Single integrated microphone
Оперативен систем:Ubuntu 20.04
Порти:
2 USB 3.2 Gen 1 port
1 USB 2.0 port
1 headset (headphone and microphone combo) port
1 HDMI 1.4 port
HDMI 1.4 (Maximum resolution supported over HDMI is 1920x1080 @60Hz. No 4K/2K output)
1 RJ45 Ethernet port (flip-down)
Батерија: 4-Cell Battery, 54WHr
